casebody.data:
WEAVER
v.
DEDMON, et al. 203P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 1, 2017 Leonard T. Jernigan, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Kristina Brown Thompson, Attorney at Law, Anthony L. Lucas, Attorney at Law, for Weaver, Shaun.

M. Hayes Jernigan, Attorney at Law.

J. Timothy Wilson, Attorney at Law, M. Pierce Sandwith, Attorney at Law, Bryan L. Cantley, Attorney at Law, for Seegars Fence Company, Inc., et al.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 29th of August 2017 by Plaintiff and Defendants (Seegars Fence Company, Inc. of Elizabeth City and Builders Mutual Insurance Company) to Hold Petitions for Discretionary Review in Abeyance:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of November 2017."
